definition: common water plantain (Alisma plantago-aquatica)/water plantain rhizome (used in TCM)
pool/pond/(of metals etc) luster/favor or beneficence/damp/moist
to flow out swiftly/to flood/a torrent/diarrhea/laxative

sentences.english: The Organic development sequence of Alisma orientale in early stage of ontogeny was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了澤瀉個體發育早期的器官發育順序。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To study on the diuretic active compounds of Alisma orientalis.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究澤瀉利尿作用的物質基礎。

sentences.english: Objective To excogitate Alisma orientate(Sam. ) Juzep. flower bolt Cultivating and standardization cultivating technology of field planting management.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究出澤瀉花苔培育與田間規範化栽培管理技術。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo study the effect of Zexie decoction on blood pressure in mice.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究澤瀉湯對正常小鼠血壓的影響及其特點。

sentences.english: To discover the method of enrichment and purification of total terpenoid components from Alisma Orientalis with macroporous resin.
sentences.chinese: 探討用大孔樹脂富集純化澤瀉總萜醇類成分的方法。

sentences.english: The floristic features and geographical distribution of the Alismataceae flora in Hubei.
sentences.chinese: 湖北澤瀉科植物的區系特點和地理分佈。

sentences.english: A method for mensuration of uniconazol remanet in a Alisma orientalis(Sam.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了一種測定澤瀉塊莖中烯效唑殘留量的方法。

sentences.english: It is suggested that Rhizoma Alismatis is an effective drug on the treatment of ascites.
sentences.chinese: 提示了在利水中藥中澤瀉是治療腹水的有效藥物。

definition: Ningpo figwort (Scrophularia ningpoensis)/root of Ningpo figwort (used in TCM)
dried fruit of immature citron or trifoliate orange (used in TCM)
black atractylodes rhizome (dried rhizome of any of several atractylodes species) (TCM)
dwarf lilyturf (Ophiopogon japonicus), its tuber used in TCM
radish seed (used in TCM to treat indigestion)
variant of 黃檗|黄檗[huang2 bo4]
milk vetch/plant genus Astragalus/huangqi 黃芪|黄芪, Astragalus membranaceus (used in TCM)
eight-treasure decoction, tonic formula used in Chinese medicine
